settings.title: Settings
settings.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account?

about.title: AI & AR Virtual Try-On
about.description: ShoeFit is the first app in Vietnam combining AI and 3D technology. Virtual try-on, perfect size finding, and personalized style advice — bringing a confident and convenient online shoe shopping experience.
about.feature_ar_desc: Try on 3D shoes instantly using your phone camera. Bringing the in-store experience right to your home.
about.feature_style_desc: Get personalized outfit suggestions from our AI. We help you find the perfect look to match your shoes.
about.feature_ai2d_desc: Upload your photo and instantly see a realistic image of you wearing your chosen shoes — powered by advanced AI technology.
about.feature_realism_desc: View hyper-realistic 2D images of every product. Our AI ensures you see every detail clearly.
about.image_alt: ShoeFit AR and AI Technology Showcase

auth.forgot_pass_desc: Enter your registered email. We will send a new password to it.
auth.change_pass_desc: For security, please do not share your password with others.
auth.msg_pass_length: New password must be at least 6 characters.
auth.msg_pass_same: New password cannot be the same as the old one.
auth.msg_sent_email: New password has been sent to your email.

contact.title: Free Consultation
contact.address: Hoa Lac Hi-tech Park, km 29 Thang Long Avenue, Hanoi
contact.alert_success: Thank you for contacting us! We will respond as soon as possible.

profile.desc_foot_profile: This information helps AI generate try-on images more accurately for your body.

services_page.ai2d_desc: Upload your photo and instantly see a realistic image of you wearing your chosen shoes — powered by advanced AI technology.
services_page.ar_desc: Use your camera for a real-time 3D experience. Move your feet, change angles, and visualize every shoe with perfect scale and fit.
services_page.advisor_desc: Let AI help define your style with suggestions for shoes, outfits, and accessories that match your preferences.

style_advisor.title: Discover Your Style
style_advisor.subtitle: Choose your gender and occasion to explore outfits that match your favorite shoes.

tryon2d.title: AI Photo Try-On Experience
tryon2d.subtitle: Discover the feeling of wearing shoes instantly with AI
tryon2d.upload_note: Note: Choose a full-body photo for the best results
tryon2d.result_placeholder: AI simulation result will appear here.
tryon2d.alert_missing_input: Please upload your photo and select a shoe.

tryonvideo.title: AI Video Try-On Experience
tryonvideo.subtitle: Observe how shoes move on your feet from multiple angles
tryonvideo.upload_note: Note: Ensure photo is clear for best motion generation
tryonvideo.result_placeholder: AI video result will appear here.
tryonvideo.alert_missing_input: Please upload photo and select a shoe.

footer.slogan: Try On. Fit Right. Shop Smart
